Archived News

  • Sep 2017

    UTSASLab students Pandian Raju and Jayashree Mohan were awarded scholarships by Alibaba and Facebook to attend SOSP 2017.Congratulations! Pandian will be presenting PebblesDB at SOSP while Jayashree will be attending the Ada Diversity Workshop.

  • Sep 2017

    Our poster on analyzing IO Amplification in Linux file systems was awarded Best Poster at ApSys 2017!

  • Aug 2017

    PebblesDB, our work on reducing IO amplification in key-value stores, was accepted to SOSP 2017!

  • Jul 2017

    Dr. Chidambaram will be visiting and working with the VMware Research Group for a month (from mid-June) in the summer!

  • Jul 2017

    We presented CrashMonkey, CC-Log, and our storage energy study at HotStorage 17.

  • May 2017

    Received a Special Research Grant from UT Austin for our work on measuring energy consumption of storage!

  • Apr 2017

    Three papers accepted to HotStorage 17! Congratulations Jayashree, Dhathri, Santiago, and Ashlie!

  • Mar 2017

    Our CCFS paper was featured in the Morning Paper!

  • Mar 2017

    Our paper titled “From Crash Consistency to Transactions” was accepted to HostOS17.

  • Feb 2017

    Our FAST 2017 paper won one of the two Best Paper Awards!

  • Dec 2016

    Facebook Academic Program supports Dr. Chidambaram’s research!

  • Dec 2016

    Our work on Application Crash Consistency got accepted to FAST 2017!

  • Nov 2016

    Dr. Chidambaram awarded a VMware Early Career Faculty Award!

  • Nov 2016

    Dr. Chidambaram receives the SIGOPS Dennis M. Ritchie Doctoral Dissertation Award!

  • Sep 2016

    NVMove, our work on helping developers port applications to NVM, got accepted to INFLOW 16!

  • Jul 2016

    Dr. Chidambaram receives a Google Cloud Platform Education Grant!
